content.question: In the context of the first stanza, the reference to the “dusty care-strewn paths of life” (line 3) helps establish the speaker’s viewpoint by

choices.label: foregrounding the obstacles the speaker faces in seeking out a hermitage
conveying the speaker’s perception of the prevalence of hardships in life
emphasizing the speaker’s keen awareness of the inescapability of social obligations
revealing that the speaker values the growth that comes from enduring life’s challenges

content.answer: conveying the speaker’s perception of the prevalence of hardships in life

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
